question_stem: When performing a hypothesis test, it is acceptable to specify the significance level after the pp-value has been computed.
question_stem_html: When performing a hypothesis test, it is acceptable to specify the significance level after the pp-value has been computed.

items.part_stem: When performing a hypothesis test, it is acceptable to specify the significance level after the pp-value has been computed.
items.part_stem_html: When performing a hypothesis test, it is acceptable to specify the significance level after the pp-value has been computed.
items.solution: This is known as data snooping and should be avoided. The significance level should be specified even before the data is collected.
items.solution_html: This is known as data snooping and should be avoided. The significance level should be specified even before the data is collected.
